authorCredential.translatedString: Reader and writer on Quora since 31st August 2016
authorCredential.description: Reader and writer on Quora since 31st August 2016

question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "What are some good examples of racism on Quora?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "I had no idea that racism was such a big problem in the Indian subcontinent before I joined Quora.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I knew there was a lot of colourism", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": " ", "modifiers": {"citation": {"target": {"type": "url", "url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Discrimination_based_on_skin_color"}, "title": "Discrimination based on skin color - Wikipedia", "index": 1, "unique_id": "OHxcs"}}}, {"text": " here. But racism? I thought it was just a problem of the West.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "On Quora, I came across ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "some ", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": "really racist Indians, Pakistanis, and in particular Kashmiris.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I saw answers that try to prove that the whole human civilization originated in India. The answers of these sort end up justifying caste system and tell you that Brahmans are the", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": " real Aryans", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": " of the world. The purest race.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I saw commenters who commented how all the Indians have filth in their DNA and are \u201cfilthy Aryans mixed with Dravidians.\u201d", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "A few self proclaimed ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "genealogy experts ", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": "proved Kashmiris are Europeans and all the others in the subcontinent are dirty mixed race.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "The level of racism some of the answers here contain is mind-numbing.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I will give credit to the Quora moderation. They remove this venom from the Quora\u2019s system as soon as possible. So I can\u2019t show you all the wretched opinions I have come across.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I don\u2019t just have a good (bad?) example but the best (worst?) example of them all. Thanks to ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "Sahil Chatta", "modifiers": {"link": {"type": "user", "uid": 13446952, "url": "https://www.quora.com/profile/Sahil-Chatta"}}}, {"text": ". (Should I be thankful?) He found a racist troll who he talks about in his post, here. ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": " ", "modifiers": {"citation": {"target": {"type": "board_item", "board_item_id": 4338274, "url": "https://www.quora.com/"}, "title": "Space Post", "index": 2, "unique_id": "PdoZY"}}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "See for yourself:", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-08b324c0e350b633d39436213fc54cc3", "height": 768, "width": 1360, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-2fea6968474b9585f935b488679d4474", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Translation", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "ahahaha Black daughter of a swine.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": true, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-b96037296f05d0d87f620ba5fede6677", "height": 1920, "width": 1080, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-466818bbb7c76df3b5f9150eacd43a79", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "[Source: ", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": "Space Post", "modifiers": {"italic": true, "link": {"type": "board_item", "board_item_id": 4338274, "url": "https://www.quora.com/"}}}, {"text": "]", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "How can one paragraph contain so many misconceptions and racist speculations?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-ac76a8c7b0f2fd75a02ee3e0d26f1804", "height": 1070, "width": 816, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-e8ae58e15dd1016a3590971887d2fa53", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "[Source: ", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": "Space Post", "modifiers": {"italic": true, "link": {"type": "board_item", "board_item_id": 4338274, "url": "https://www.quora.com/"}}}, {"text": "]", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "The Quora moderation acts quickly but it still needs to be faster than it is right now to tackle these toxic trolls.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "(", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": " I hope it doesn't collapse my answer though. That would be quite ironic.", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": ")", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}
